description: Armenia says its SU-25 fighter jet was shot down in Armenian air space, a claim Turkey denies.
title: Armenia says its fighter jet 'shot down by Turkey'
title_page: Armenia says its fighter jet 'shot down by Turkey' - BBC News
maintext: And yet it is Russia, not Turkey, that holds the key to the region. Russia has a mutual defence pact with Armenia and a military base there. Turkey is already at odds with Russia over Syria and Libya, and the Caucasus could open a new front.
